docs.title: Install
docs.text:
• Link: Gnome Extensions (use firefox to open)
  • Install extension in firefox
$ sudo apt install -y gnome-shell-extension-manager # old: chrome-gnome-shell

docs.title: Recommendations
docs.text:
• cpufreq by konkor
  • Net Speed by AlynxZhou
  • Freon by UshakovVasilii
  • Coverflow Alt-Tab by p91paul
  • OpenWeather by jens

docs.title: Install for this repo
docs.text:
$ pip3 install mkdocs
$ pip3 install mkdocs-material

docs.title: Neovim
docs.text: • ref: To Lua or Not to Lua

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
• use bob
$ cargo install bob-nvim
$ bob install 0.11.0
$ bob ls
$ bob use 0.11.0

docs.title: Setup for virtual environment (legacy)
docs.text:
$ mkdir ~/.config/nvim -p
$ sh -c 'curl -fLo "${XDG_DATA_HOME:-$HOME/.local/share}"/nvim/site/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim'
$ curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_16.x | sudo -E bash -
$ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y nodejs"),
$ lndir -silent {DRIVER_PATH}/dotfiles/.config/nvim ~/.config/nvim
$ vim +'silent! PlugInstall' +qall < /dev/tty
$ curl https://pyenv.run | bash
$ echo 'export PYENV_ROOT="$HOME/.pyenv"' >> ~/.bashrc
$ echo 'command -v pyenv >/dev/null || export PATH="$PYENV_ROOT/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
$ echo 'eval "$(pyenv init -)"' >> ~/.bashrc
$ ~/.pyenv/bin/pyenv install -v 3.10.6 && ~/.pyenv/bin/pyenv virtualenv 3.10.6 neovim3
$ ~/.pyenv/versions/neovim3/bin/python -m pip install pynvim

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
$ sudo apt install -y git
$ curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aben20807/oh-my-ouo/master/setup.sh | bash

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
$ sudo snap install tmux
$ printf '\nexport TERM=xterm' >> ~/.bashrc
$ # reopen terminal
  • .tmux.conf: aben20807/dotfiles/linux/.tmux.conf

docs.title: Copy mode
docs.text:
• PREFIX [: change to copy mode
  • q: quit copy mode
  • PREFIX v: select in copy mode
  • PREFIX y: copy select in copy mode
  • PREFIX ]: paste
  • PREFIX p: paste

docs.title: Useful functions
docs.text:
• PREFIX w: open the dash board of all sessions and windows
  • PREFIX s: open the dash board of all sessions
  • PREFIX z: zoom in/out the current pane
  • PREFIX t: show current time
  • PREFIX ?: check all key bindings
  • PREFIX :: change to command mode
  • PREFIX C-k: clear history (scrollback buffer)

docs.title: mainline
docs.text:
• For changing linux kernel
$ sudo add-apt-repository ppa:cappelikan/ppa
$ sudo apt update
$ sudo apt install -y mainline

docs.title: GCC/G++
docs.text:
$ sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
$ sudo apt update
$ sudo apt install -y gcc-11 g++-11
